2+1.sig_info: An upgrade to Bucky's bionic arm grants his Critical Hits a 15% chance to Power Drain his target for 13 to 25.01% of the target's max power. The amount drained increases based on Critical Hit Damage.

ALL ATTACKS: 11% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 7 seconds, granting +41.5 Attack.
PASSIVE: Winter Soldier begins the fight with one type of Ammo loaded into all his guns. Each time he launches a Special Attack he automatically switches to the next Ammo Type. Winter Soldier can also Dash back and hold Block for 1.50 seconds to manually switch ammo types.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Armor Piercing - Winter Soldier ignores all of the opponent’s Armor and Resistance Ratings.
Incendiary - Winter Soldier Incinerates the opponent, dealing 78.85 Energy Damage over 6.50 seconds. This also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50%.
Hollow Point - Any Bleed effect triggered during the attack has its Duration increased by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 55% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 78.85 Direct Damage over 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 85% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 95.45 Direct Damage over 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 190.9 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds.
